title: Learning Objective 1.3
stimulusHtml:
Students describe how context influences artistic decisions about creating a work of art.

0-1 point

Accurately explains why this site was chosen for the Parthenon.
descriptions: Does not accurately explain why this site was chosen for the Parthenon.
Accurately explains why this site was chosen for the Parthenon.

title: Learning Objective 1.3
stimulusHtml:
Students describe how context influences artistic decisions about creating a work of art.

0-1 point

Accurately uses specific visual evidence to explain how the sculptural program of the Parthenon addresses the religious function of the building.
descriptions: Does not accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how the sculptural program of the Parthenon addresses the religious function of the building.
Accurately uses specific visual evidence to explain how the sculptural program of the Parthenon addresses the religious function of the building.
